text:
Florin Vașken Halagian (7 March 1939 – 12 August 2019) was a Romanian football player and manager. He was the manager who has the most matches in Liga I with 878 games. He played for Dinamo București. He managed Argeș Pitești and the Romanian national team. Halagian was born in Bucharest.
Halagian died on 12 August 2019 in Bucharest at the age of 80.
